    • Method Detail

      • writeOptimisation

        public boolean writeOptimisation()
        This operation enables (or disables) the write-to-log optimisation. Since it is only called during the commit protocol, implementation classes can set the value dynamically through some application specific logic.

      • modified

        protected boolean modified()
        Description copied from class: StateManager
        The object's state is about to be modified, and StateManager should take a snapshot of the state if the object is being used within a transaction.
        Overrides:
        modified in class StateManager
        Returns:
        true on success, false otherwise.
